Package org.eclipse.jetty.util.thread

Class AutoLock.WithCondition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.jetty.util.thread.AutoLock
      • org.eclipse.jetty.util.thread.AutoLock.WithCondition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Enclosing class:
    AutoLock
    public static class AutoLock.WithCondition
extends AutoLock

    A reentrant lock with a condition that can be used in a try-with-resources statement.

    Typical usage:

     // Waiting
 try (AutoLock lock = _lock.lock())
 {
     lock.await();
 }

 // Signaling
 try (AutoLock lock = _lock.lock())
 {
     lock.signalAll();
 }
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
